variants.Description in input context: This variant was found to alter phosphorylation patterns on LRRK2.
Associated with increased α-synuclein aggregation in patient-derived fibroblasts.

Material used.Description: SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells were transiently transfected with wild-type and mutant LRRK2 constructs.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_000177486.4:c.2565A>G exhibited a 2.5-fold increase in autophosphorylation compared to wild-type LRRK2.
Fibroblasts expressing the variant NM_000177486.4:c.1898G>A showed significantly increased α-synuclein inclusions.

Biological replicates.Description: Each experiment was performed with n=3 biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 construct served as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by Tukey’s post-hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Phosphorylation signal within the range observed for wild-type LRRK2.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Phosphorylation signal exceeding 1.5 times the mean signal observed for wild-type LRRK2.
